Song.title: Low In The Grave He Lay
Song.copyright: Words & Music by Robert Lowry Public domain

Arrangement.text:
Verse 1: [A]Low in [D/A]the grave [A]He lay, [E]Je[E7]sus, my [D/A]Sav[A]ior [D]Wait[Ddim]ing [D]the [A]coming day [F#m]Je[E/B]sus [B7]my [E]Lord
Chorus: [A]Up from the grave He arose{,} (He arose) With a mighty [D]triumph o'er His [A]foes{,} (He arose) [E]He a[E7]rose a victor{,} from the [F#m]dark [D]do[A]main, And He [D]lives for[B]ever{,} with His [E]saints [B7]to [E]reign He a[A]rose! (He arose) He a[D]rose! (He arose) Halle[A/E]lujah! [E6]Christ [E]a[A]rose!
Verse 2: [A]Vainly [D/A]they watched [A]His bed [E]Je[E7]sus, my [D/A]Sav[A]ior! [D]Vain[Ddim]ly [D]they [A]sealed the dead [F#m]Je[E/B]sus, [B7]my [E]Lord!
Verse 3: [A]Death could [D/A]not keep [A]his prey, [E]Je[E7]sus, my [D/A]Sav[A]ior! [D]He [Ddim]tore [D]the [A]bars away, [F#m]Je[E/B]sus, [B7]my [E]Lord!
Arrangement.searchtext: verse 1 low in the grave he lay jesus my savior waiting the coming day jesus my lord chorus up from the grave he arose he arose with a mighty triumph oer his foes he arose he arose a victor from the dark domain and he lives forever with his saints to reign he arose he arose he arose he arose hallelujah christ arose verse 2 vainly they watched his bed jesus my savior vainly they sealed the dead jesus my lord verse 3 death could not keep his prey jesus my savior he tore the bars away jesus my lord
